id.description: The default id should NOT be changed, unless there is a specific need to create separate collection entries which target or exclude specific Firefox versions.

filter_expression.description:
This is NOT directly used by AMRemoteSettings, but has special functionality in Remote Settings.
See https://remote-settings.readthedocs.io/en/latest/target-filters.html#how

extensions.quarantinedDomains.list.description: Set of domains to be quarantined separated by a comma (e.g. 'domain1.org,domain2.com'). NOTE: this pref value should be set to a ASCII encoded string and its size smaller than 1MB

quarantinedDomains.description: These settings provide a set of domain names to be quarantined (restricted by default to unverified extensions, which only the app or the user may grant back). IMPORTANT: The add-ons team should be consulted before introducing any new entry of this type.

extensions.InstallTrigger.enabled.description: Show/Hide the InstallTrigger global completely (both the global and its methods will not be accessible anymore). IMPORTANT: The webcompat team should be consulted before turning this to false, because it may also potentially impact UA detection for some websites.

installTriggerDeprecation.description: These settings control the visibility of the InstallTrigger global.
